DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the predictive value of standardized cognitive tests performed in health examination centres for the diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease and related disorders among adults aged 65 years and older with a subjective memory complaint.
DOC.brief_title: Predictive Value of Cognitive Tests Performed for the Diagnosis of Alzheimer's Disease and Related Disorders
DOC.detailed_description: The main objective of this study is to determine the predictive value of standardized cognitive tests performed in health examination centres for the diagnosis of Alzheimer's disease and related disorders among adults aged 65 years and older with a subjective memory complaint.
